summary: This bill, the "National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration Sexual Harassment and Assault Prevention Improvements Act of 2025," amends the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2017 to address sexual harassment and assault within NOAA. It mandates reporting, establishes anonymity exceptions for victims, and requires policy updates. It also includes provisions for mariner reporting, definitions, conforming amendments, and prohibitions on individuals with certain sexual offense convictions serving in NOAA's Commissioned Officer Corps. The bill expands the scope of existing laws to include equal employment and enhances reporting mechanisms.
